item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

12. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (12 points | 2 comments)

26. Exa Laboratories (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer to Build AI Chips ( | hide)

29. SpaceX engineers brought on at FAA after probationary employees were fired (116 points | 30 comments)
